block_text.room_desc:
This air-conditioned one-bedroom suite features a private balcony that opens up to views of Son Tra Peninsula. The open plan living area boasts a lounge fitted with flat-screen cable TV, sofa and a desk as well as a kitchen, dining area and in room laundry. The en suite bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Suite can accommodate up to 1 child.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_text.important_information: Food and beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service hours. Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). A damage deposit of VND 1000000 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full, in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 6 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 6 to 12 year are charged  VND 2250000 per night when using existing beds.
One child under 3 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One older child or adult is charged VND 800000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 6.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
Pets are not allowed.
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation within 1 day before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. VND 1,000,000 Damage deposit per stay is excluded. A City tax is not applicable.
items: VND 1,000,000 Damage deposit per stay is excluded.
A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
